text: A zeptosecond is one of the smallest measurements of time. Zeptoseconds are mainly used in the propagation of light within a molecule. Or as stated by LiveScience in "Meet the zeptosecond, the shortest unit of time ever measured," "A zeptosecond is a trillionth of a billionth of a second, or a decimal point followed by 20 zeroes and a 1." (.000000000000000000001). Category:Units of time Meet the zeptosecond, the shortest unit of time ever measured
title: Zeptosecond
